attributes.action: insist that racist behaviour will not be tolerated in Formula 1.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The racist behaviour that was seen in Spain recently towards Lewis Hamilton, is totally unacceptable. We insist that the Prime Minister make this clear to the Federation Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA) and the Prime Minister should propose that Spain should not be entitled to it's Grand Prix on 27th April 2008 as a result. To show the racists that racism will not be tolerated in sport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
